item.title: Multi-line editing in VS Code
item.description: How to edit multiple lines in VS Code in Mac: Cmd + Opt + Up/Down If you want to do something like a PgUp or PgDn, do fn + Up/Down, like: Cmd + Opt + Shift + fn + Up/Down References: Stack Overflow Mac keyboard shortcuts
